title: Data Provider Signal Selector
description: Selects signals from a data provider's adagents.json catalog. Used for product definitions and agent authorization. Supports three selection patterns: all signals, specific IDs, or by tags.

oneOf.description: Select all signals from the data provider

data_provider_domain.description: Domain where data provider's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'polk.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating all signals from this data provider are included

data_provider_domain.description: Domain where data provider's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'polk.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by specific signal IDs

signal_ids.description: Specific signal IDs from the data provider's catalog

data_provider_domain.description: Domain where data provider's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'polk.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by signal tags

signal_tags.description: Signal tags from the data provider's catalog. Selector covers all signals with these tags
